attributes.action: I want to see the Government recognise people who live in Vans or mobile homes
attributes.additional_details:
I too am a vandweller but fortunately I ever static home to be in but many of those out there who have only their van to dwelling have nowhere to park without being persecuted by the local people and the police.

This should not be the case if we have Oscar like the covid-19 we should make provisions for these people to be able to park safely and to isolate themselves.
attributes.background: I want the government to make prevision for van dwellers for example today with the covid 19 scare we find that van dwellers have nowhere to go not only that they are persecuted.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
